name: js-sdsl
description: javascript standard data structure library which benchmark against C++ STL

scripts.build: yarn lint && rm -rf dist/test && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:umd:min
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && tsc src/index.ts --downlevelIteration --declaration --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist/cjs
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf dist/esm && tsc src/index.ts --downlevelIteration --declaration --module es2015 --target es5 --outDir dist/esm
scripts.build:umd: yarn build:esm && rm -rf dist/umd && mkdir dist/umd && rollup dist/esm/index.js --format umd --name sdsl -o dist/umd/js-sdsl.js
scripts.build:umd:min: yarn build:umd && cd dist/umd && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --source-map --ie8 --comments -o js-sdsl.min.js -- js-sdsl.js
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/test && tsc --downlevelIteration --declaration src/test.ts --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist/test && node ./dist/test/test.js
scripts.deploy: yarn build:umd:min && typedoc type --disableSources && mv dist/umd/* docs && gh-pages -d docs
